results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/33]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Trip to China - France’s Foreign Affairs Minister, Maurice Schumann, visits Peking. 2. Georges Segal - New York born sculptor, Georges Segal, exhibiting his sculptures in Paris. 3.Space astronomy - Atlas 183 telescope returned to France after its tests with NASA equipment. 4. The surrealists - “The Surrealists from 1922-42” Exhibition opens on the Rue de Rivoli in Paris. 5. The Marais Festival ‘72 - restoration and variety of performances.

results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: President Bourguiba in Paris - official state visit to France.
